ABOUT-ME.TITLE: About me
ABOUT-ME.INTRO: Hey, I’m Lucas. During my business degree, one thing fascinated me above all else: how technology forms the core of modern companies. That curiosity quickly turned into a mission. Today, I combine my business expertise with solid software development skills and will be professionalizing this path academically through a degree in Business Informatics (Wirtschaftsinformatik) starting this April.
ABOUT-ME.LEARNING: Continuous Optimization: I strongly believe in the “1% better every day” mindset. I am driven to refine systems, optimize codebases, and stay at the forefront of new technologies.
ABOUT-ME.APPROACH: Explorative Curiosity: For me, standing still is not an option. I actively seek out new challenges and technologies to push beyond my comfort zone and broaden my perspective.
ABOUT-ME.LOCATION: Location: Based in Leipzig, Germany, and open to remote work.

SKILLS.TITLE: Skill Set
SKILLS.DESCRIPTION: Technology is my toolbox for solving real problems. I enjoy working with modern front-end tools and understanding how things work under the hood. The fast pace of the web excites me — new frameworks and best practices are a constant opportunity to grow. Clear structure, logical solutions and maintainable code guide how I work.
SKILLS.CONTACT_ME: Contact me! I’m always expanding my stack.
SKILLS.TOOLTIP: I have a special interest in learning

FEATURED-PROJECTS.TITLE: Featured Projects
FEATURED-PROJECTS.DESCRIPTION: Explore a selection of my work - Interact with projects to see my skills in action.

FEEDBACK.TITLE: What my colleagues say about me

ITEMS.NAME: Maik Groth
ITEMS.TEXT: Working with Lucas was highly productive and a true collaboration between equals. He works in a very structured and detail-oriented manner, which significantly improved the overall quality of our project. His execution was always clean and reliable, and he consistently provided solution-oriented ideas whenever challenges arose. A strong team player I would definitely work with again.

ITEMS.NAME: Leon Leuning
ITEMS.TEXT: Lucas was very strong in team communication and helped structure and coordinate our collaboration. He demonstrated clear leadership qualities and brought structure to our workflow. Thanks to his high standards and attention to detail, we were able to raise the quality of both the design and the code and deliver a strong final product. He worked quickly and reliably, which helped a lot — especially as we approached the deadline. His careful way of working was also genuinely educational and helped me grow personally.

ITEMS.NAME: Tizian Borges Jost
ITEMS.TEXT: Lucas has a sharp eye for detail and a deep understanding of frontend architectures. His contributions to our projects were always of the highest quality.

CONTACT-FORM.TITLE: Let's work together
CONTACT-FORM.DESCRIPTION: I enjoy contributing to real projects and getting involved in new challenges. I’m especially motivated by environments where I can take ownership and grow step by step.  With my business background, I bring a structured, solution-oriented perspective to technical challenges and think beyond code in terms of product and user value.
CONTACT-FORM.DESCRIPTION_CTA: If you’re looking for a frontend developer who thinks ahead, takes ownership and wants to grow long-term -
CONTACT-FORM.EMAIL_INPUT_PLACEHOLDER: Let me know your email address
CONTACT-FORM.PRIVACY_POLICY_TEXT1: and agree to the processing of my data as specified.
